transArray.content: The price booked by Ctrip is very suitable and cost-effective. The check-in experience is very good. The room decoration style is fashionable and novel, the lighting in the room is good, the wireless speed in the room is also good, and the service staff are also very enthusiastic! !
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
